channel.title: CVE Feed for MarkText -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for MarkText -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-2318|2024-08-02T06:19:14.891Z -- marktext -- marktext
item.description: DOM-based XSS in src/muya/lib/contentState/pasteCtrl.js in MarkText 0.17.1 and before on Windows, Linux and macOS allows arbitrary JavaScript code to run in the context of MarkText main window. This vulnerability can be exploited if a user copies text from a malicious webpage and paste it into MarkText.
